title: "We're Going to Find Samuel L. Jackson" - Top Five Superhero Films
itunes:title: "We're Going to Find Samuel L. Jackson" - Top Five Superhero Films
description:
Hey Halflings ... it's our 50th Episode! To celebrate we're doing something a little fun today, keeping the Super theme going from last week we're here to discuss our personal Top Five Superhero Films of all time. Please don't roast us!


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

Theme Music by Jonathan Charles @the_lonely_orchestra

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Hey Halflings ... it's our 50th Episode! To celebrate we're doing something a little fun today, keeping the Super theme going from last week we're here to discuss our personal Top Five Superhero Films of all time. Please don't roast us!


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.
